title: Flouted and fulfilled Grice's Maxims by the characters in Si Doel Anak Sekolahan III
abstract: This thesis is a study which uses Discourse Analysis theory to analyze the flouting and fulfilling Grice's Maxims happened in the language of Si Doel Anak Sekolahan HI in RCTL Beside that, it also tries to find the reason of flouting Grice's Maxims. Then the analysis is based on the utterances produced by the characters in Si Doel Anak Sekolahan HI which is transcribed into written form. By using descriptive methodology, the writer tries to do documentary analysis and to identify the characters' utterances.. Furthermore, out of fifty-two episodes of Si Doel Anak Sekolahan m, one episode titled "Kongkalikong" is chosen based on the featuring of the main characters. To be able to identify the flouting and confirming Grice's Maxims, one theory from Discourse Analysis , Grice's Maxims Cooperative Principle theory is used to be applied in the language of Si Doel Anak Sekolahan EL From the analysis and interpretation and conclusion, it can be seen that the most flouted maxim is maxim of relevance then the most fulfilled maxim is maxim of relevance too. However, there is no one who fulfills maxim of quality and maxim of manner.
